resources.string: Think you have what it takes to defeat the Green Team? Play as the Red Team and try to beat the Green Team in a game of Tic Tac Toe! Make your Move…
Play this mode if you need to feel good about yourself or just win for once
Play against someone who actually knows what they are doing
You have a 99% chance of not winning. DISCLAIMER: Actual odds, unless you know the secret…
2. See If You Can Beat The Challenge
